title: American climbing ace Matthew Riccitello roars into lead at Tour de l’Avenir
content:
Riccitello could join elite company. Only one American won the Tour de l'Avenir, and that was Greg LeMond back in 1982.

Read the full article at American climbing ace Matthew Riccitello roars into lead at Tour de l’Avenir on Velo.
author: ahood
